name: contextWith
signature: <R, A>(f: (context: Context<R>) => A) => Effect<A, never, R>
description:
Accesses the context and applies a transformation function.
*Details This function retrieves the context of the effect and applies a pure
transformation function to it. The result of the transformation is then
returned within the effect.
documentation:
